mapper.select: select state,count(*) as count from norder o,orderitem i where id = #{id} and o.orderno=i.orderno and state2 is null group by state order by state
select state2,count(*) as count from norder o,orderitem i where id = #{id} and o.orderno=i.orderno group by state2 order by state2

select count(*) from( (select orderno, odate, orderItemNo, count, state, itemPrice,image, itemTitle, itemSize, itemColor, rownum r from (select b.orderItemNo orderItemNo, a.orderno orderno, to_char(a.odate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') odate, b.count count, b.state state, (i.Price -i.SalePrice) itemPrice, i.title itemTitle,i.image image, o.itemSize itemSize, o.itemColor itemColor from norder a, orderitem b ,item i, itemOption o where a.orderno = b.orderno and b.itemOptionNo = o.itemOptionNo and i.itemNo = o.itemNo and id = #{id} and state=#{state} )))
